import re

def trimString(string):
    trimmed_string = string.strip()
    trimmed_string = re.sub('', ' ', trimmed_string)
    return trimmed_string

import re

def trimString(string):
    trimmed_string = string.strip()
    trimmed_string = re.sub('\\s+', '', trimmed_string)
    return trimmed_string
